replies.body: Tristana's new update looks weird
Soooo ture
um is it elf or yordle
Its Yordle. Some yordles have animal-like ears. Like Lulu
For me she looks pretty good :P gj rito
But it is soooooo cute
At least the Earnest Elf skin looks elf-like now.{{champion:18}}
Tristana kinda looks like {{champion:150}} with different colours
the only gameplay update she needs is on her jump, no more jumping whilst CC'd please
When are they going to update Poppy???? {{champion:78}}

gj riot cant wait
time to main trisatna again
Yay no more getting seizures when I watch her run.
don't like that E how you have to atk them to make it blow dose it still burn them when you auto atk them or anything like that ?
It says that the charge blows up after a few seconds, the auto attacking just ramps up the damage of the explosion.
It's much stronger than she used to be. The only thing you miss out on is the heal reduction on the E.
It's a blue gremlin!!! :D
get out of here spiral knights lover.....
I think one of the reasons why it looks weird is because it kinda looks like they tried to sexualis her, It doesn't Look right for her{{champion:18}}
I don't see the sexualisation... All they did was mover her away from a Megling and towards a Yordle.
Soooooo you gonna make another trist splash now? or you just gonna use the current one that looks nothing like this new trist?
It is confirmed that she is getting a new splash, it just isn't ready yet.
i hope the rocket trist doesnt change much cause it was perfect. the only skin i really wanted.. now they changing it :S

I'm a little worried tbh. I am a huge fan of AP Tristana and I'm wondering whether it will still be a thing. I can see it will be different, but that's fine if it still has the same insane damage output.
Rito pls do not Furgot to upgrade {{champion:6}}
She look like a midget avatar.love your work rito {{champion:18}}
Could riot schedule {{champion:34}}  for an update? Her original skin is awful!!

No one even cares about yorick do they 
{{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}}
Could u please nerf {{champion:11}}
You know about CC? That thing that almost **EVERY** champion has? Or you know, you could just buy {{item:3075}}

Starts playing tristana, gets used to playstyle - Riot Changes tristana
gg riot wp
Shaco! Can we PLEASE have an update for shaco! it has been so long.
elf or yordle? :/ and yay trist nerf
It would be nice if she rolled up for a game now that she is in my own'ship!  I wouldn't want to have fifteen+rotation(=25?) champions in my stable.  I'd never get to play her.
well, now that I have 53 in my stable (+rotation), I get Tristana more often than most.  Typical Riot Logic!

LoL, 131, still don't see her that much.  I guess, we need not worry too much about algorithyms.
{{summoner:13}}
Am I the only one who thinks that they could bring out a gremlin skin for with her new look
It would be more like a moghwy wouldn't it?
yeah one or the other but imagine a green tris with a mohawk shooting forks and knives or something like that
yuck
yuck

Hey before I get to the real point, just saying this...

On your info screen it says "Excited to jump around with Tristana's update? Let us know if the comments below!

Do you mean "Let us know "on" the comments below? ;)

Also, in game name is well APTRISTANA, has been for ages, but the "new" e ability is awesome for a quick attacking adc, but horrible for a "I pretend to call myself pro AP TRIST", as your attack speed is horrible unless you go ap attackspeed which I would rate as being less workable then full ap.. Oh well I guess you can't expect something to stay the same, just look at YI, AP taken away before he was so OP, and yet now he is still OP as AD.
i just don't like the ears how they stick out like that but everything else is fine!!! {{champion:18}}
Amazing~
No more ap trist?????

I will be greatly saddened if we end up losing AP Trist. the whole point in update 4.1 was to see more diversity in the game so that it was more interesting, removing AP sounds well... not very diverse. Can someone shed some light on to whether we will see her AP again?
{{champion:103}}  going to see this update shortly?

WELL WELL LOOK WHAT THE CAT DRAGGED IN. Hey there nerdy or not so nerdy(like me) humans. I've read many post but have been not so nerdy to comment. This is my first comment, so I thought why not start on a post about my favourite champ. Wait, what was the point of my comment again... oh yeah... yes yes, I will be everywhere from now on, even in your mind cause you'll think of the long, pointless and weird comment that guy wrote(which is me, just so you know). ANYWAY, CAN'T WAIT TO RULE THE RIFT WITH NEW UPDATE OF {{champion:18}} . -don't look for me cause you won't find me hehehahahaha... hopefully you don't, seriously though don't look. GG if you read this.

when is it coming out
{{champion:18}}
Can we get trist's jump to function as a leap not a dash so I don't keep jumping over draven e's and lux q's only to get hit by them anyway?

There is no "jump" movement in the game only flash and dash 
The only dashes in the game that are immune to being displaced are uultimats
